name: Thirteen and Half Cats
description:
You have a mysterious curse. Learn magic spells that will help you to collect 13 and a half cats and find your way again. 

"Thirteen & Half Cats is an emotional experience that was made specifically to put a little brightness in your day." ~Nekomatata Games


Are you a fan of Nekomatata?
Join the Nekomtatata Fan List and we'll tell you when a new game is ready!


Soundtrack
Free Soundtrack now available on YouTube

By
Chris Zabriskie + Scott Holmes


Game duration: 
✰ About 15 minutes

Controls: 
✰ WASD or arrows to move [ press twice to run ]
✰ Click icon to cast spells
✰ Space bar to interact
✰ Support for game pad

Languages:
✰ English
✰ Français
✰ Español, translation by Maximiliano Vaccaro
✰ Nederlands, translation by Geert De Cnodder

Credits:

Team: @heyNekomatata ( website : nekomatata.com )
Music: @ChrisZabriskie + ScottHolmesMusic
Game Design: @PouleyKetchoup + @latorrilindsay
Art: @latorrilindsay
Programming: @PouleyKetchoup


Wanna be in the credits? 
Play and then visit this forum thread!

This game jam version of Thirteen & Half Cats was made for the Weekly Game Jam & Remember the Dead Jam.
Happy Halloween & Dia De Los Muertos everyone.
